description: This trap is generated when Active Session Threshold
is reached based on the calculation -

event.Summary: Active sessions upper threshold reached. Active sessions: $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD USR-MIP-MIB::usrMipHaActiveSessionThresholdReached USR-MIP-MIB::usrMipHaUpperThreshold i 1 USR-MIP-MIB::usrMipHaLowerThreshold i 1 USR-MIP-MIB::usrMipHaCurrentSessions c 9999

description: Specifies the upper Water Mark for Active Session
Threshold. If the active call capacity exceeds this
limit, then a trap is sent.
variables.name: USR-MIP-MIB::usrMipHaUpperThreshold

description: Specifies the lower Water Mark for Active Session
Threshold. If the active call capacity touches
this lower threshold after touching the Upper
threshold, then only a trap will be sent whenever
next time it exceeds the Upper Threshold.
variables.name: USR-MIP-MIB::usrMipHaLowerThreshold

description: This trap is generated when the Idle Timer has expired
and the tunnel has been disconnected. The trap contains

event.Summary: Tunnel disconnected due to idle timer expiration
